name: Grave Defender
description:
The undead are rising every nightfall, so prepare yourself to fight, build, and capture the gravestones of the deceased.

Description:
Grave Defender is a crossover of Top/Down Shooter & Tower Defense genres. In Grave Defender you play as a wizard who must stop the undead.
To survive you must use daylight to your advantage and capture the gravestones of the dead. Beware of the horde as they will attempt to claim back what was once theirs.

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam in the Godot game engine.

Theme: Let There Be Chaos!

Controls:

Keyboard + Mouse:

Interact/Capture: Spacebar
Build Towers: F
Activate Light: R
Movement: WASD
Cycle Between Towers: Q/E or Scroll-Wheel
Wand Shot: Left Mouse Button (Hold to auto fire)
Fireball: Right Mouse Button (Hold to auto fire)

Gamepad:

Interact/Capture: A
Build Towers: B
Activate Light: Y
Movement: Left Stick
Aim: Right Stick
Cycle Between Towers:  R1/L1
Basic Shot: R2
Fireball: L2
